attributes.action: Introduce a £50 book fund for all 16-19 A-Level students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many young people, especially in London, are hard-pressed for money - there are transport, food, rent etc costs. However students NEED BOOKS - these are expensive and so all A-level students should be aided with a £50 book funds.

rejection.details: Please use a correct, full name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
